A

addEqualityConstraint(double, double) - Method in class com.manyangled.snowball.analysis.interpolation.MonotonicSplineInterpolator
Add a hard equality constraint that the interpolation s(x) = y.
addGradientEqualityConstraint(double, double) - Method in class com.manyangled.snowball.analysis.interpolation.MonotonicSplineInterpolator
Add a hard equality constraint that the derivative of interpolation s'(x) = dydx.

C

com.manyangled.snowball.analysis.interpolation - package com.manyangled.snowball.analysis.interpolation
 

I

interpolate(double[], double[]) - Method in class com.manyangled.snowball.analysis.interpolation.MonotonicSplineInterpolator
Given data (x1, y1), (x2, y2)..., fit an interpolating spline that is constrained to be monotonic.

M

The default value for number of piecewise polynomial intervals (m)
MonotonicSplineInterpolator - Class in com.manyangled.snowball.analysis.interpolation
Interpolates data using a spline that is constrained to be monotonic non-decreasing.
